name: Earth Attack
description:
Tragedy strikes as aliens attack Earth. You're left alone to pilot the last remaining spacecraft on its way back to Earth from Mars Colony. Avoid missiles, asteroids, enemy ships, and more as you accumulate high-scores in arcade game Earth Attack. Control your spacecraft with WASD and triumph over obstacles and enemies alike to save Earth!

Features:
  • Replayable Endless Arcade-Style Gameplay Loop
  • Space
  • Alien Ships
  • Missiles
  • Asteroids
  • Score Attack
